description: Ron is 22-years old, stands 5'10' tall and weighs about 160 lbs.  He's very cute and shy but he puts on a really hot show for us in the War Chest Update.  Mike knows how to find the cuties and Ron is right up there with some of his best.  Get up close and personal with Ron in the War Chest tonight and get ready to see his next step in next week's War Chest Update.
title: brock
